## `SetWindowSize`

Resizes the program's window size\index{User interface!window size} to the specified width and height.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetWindowSize(number width,
              number height)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`number` width | The program window width (in pixels).
`number` height | The program window height (in pixels).
